inclusion.criterion: Generalized epilepsy with generalized onset motor seizure (ILAE 2017)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Treatment-naive patients or patients who had not taken any treatment for at least 4 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of any recent traumatic brain injury, cerebral ischemia/TIA/stroke
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 41 year old man with history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
